amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for medical services at the Veterans Health Administration for the treatment of post-traumatic stress disorder in veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
